panels.description: Antidote errors which need investigation in the logging logs
panels.title: Errors

panels.description:
Antidote warnings which need investigation in the logging logs rather sooner than later.
This graph will decay over time.
If the warning count keeps increases, this indicates that the node might crash soon.
panels.title: Warnings

panels.description:
1= Up
0 = Unknown
-1 = Down
2 = Unexpectedly Up
-2 = Unexpectedly Down
panels.title: Member Availability
